items.summary: Fix the admin route guard so it does not show the 'Access Denied' screen while the admin-status check is still loading; instead, render a clear loading state until `useIsAdmin()` has resolved (success or error).

Ensure backend admin authorization is correctly bootstrap-able so legitimate administrators are not permanently treated as non-admins (e.g., add an explicit admin bootstrap/management API that can be invoked safely to grant admin to a principal, with strict access control to prevent privilege escalation).

Update the admin access-denied UX to guide the user when they are logged in but not an admin: keep the existing English message but add a clear next step (e.g., sign out and sign in with the admin identity, or contact the administrator).
